EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202304-HHS-ENT-HIMSS-2023.02a. Follow-Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for connecting with us at HIMSS23
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for connecting at HIMSS23 Let’s keep the conversation going. There’s still more to discover: • Explore our virtual nursing resources <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/virtual-nursing/]]>. Find a wealth of information about the practice of virtual nursing and an overview of its benefits. • Watch this video <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/video/client-testimonial-what-do-you-look-for-in-a-virtual-care-partner/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=EM-202304-HHS-ENT-Demand-Gen&utm_campaign_id=hhs-2023/]]> to see why Teladoc Health is the trusted virtual care partner for hundreds of hospitals and health systems About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
